item.title: 在CentOS下利用FFMPEG对视频进行转码
item.author: ysqi@yushuangqi.com (虞双齐)
item.description: https://segmentfault.com/a/ 先按照ffmpeg的安装攻略，搞定你CentOS上的ffmpeg，我目前使用的版本是3.0.2 然后直接上代码 package main import ( "fmt" "log" "os" "os/exec" "time" ) func main() { var srcFileName, outputfilename string log.SetFlags(log.Lshortfile | log.Ldate | log.Ltime) if len(os.Args) != 3 { fmt.Println("简单的转码服务，利用FFMPEG和编码器转换成MP4.") fmt.Println("使用：[输入文件路径] [输出文件路径]") os.Exit(1) } else { srcFileName = os.Args[1] outputfilename = os.Args[2] } param := "ffmpeg -y -i " + srcFileName + " -metadata:s:v rotate=0 -vf fps=15,setdar=dar=1 -s 480x480 -pix_fmt yuv420p -strict -2 -c:v h264 -b:v 500k -b:a 48k -ss 0 -t 300 -threads 2 " + outputfilename + "" fmt.
